summary: The diff implements the new navigation UX components (sticky navbar with hamburger menu, scroll progress bar, floating Back to Top and ‚ÄúüéÇ Create Wish‚Äù buttons) plus smooth-scroll utilities and scroll-spy highlighting. Anchor IDs and sticky-header offsets are added for several sections, but the diff evidence does not confirm all required section IDs (/marketplace in particular) nor that the special /pricing pseudo-route behavior in App.tsx is preserved. Additionally, multiple non-requested section redesign/feature changes appear in the modified-file summaries.

missing_requirements.requirement: Assign anchor IDs to all major sections using the exact IDs specified, including Marketplace id="marketplace", and ensure existing /pricing pseudo-route behavior (scroll to Pricing + open PricingComparisonModal) continues to work.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows IDs added for home/create-wish/templates/pricing/dashboard/faq, but no diff evidence shows an element with id="marketplace". Also, App.tsx is truncated and does not show the /pricing pseudo-route scroll+modal behavior being preserved.

hallucinated_features.description: Significant redesign/feature additions in OutputSection (carousel, confetti, additional export/share behaviors) beyond adding anchors/navigation affordances.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly forbid redesigning/changing content/behavior of existing sections beyond anchor IDs and navigation affordances; the diff summary indicates extensive new functionality in OutputSection.

hallucinated_features.description: ExamplesSection changed to a Pinterest-style responsive grid with tone filter and ‚ÄúUse This Style‚Äù prefill integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement and appears to alter section behavior/layout beyond anchors/navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer quick links updated (including new Community and Marketplace anchor links) and attribution/UTM tracking changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Footer changes were not requested as part of the navigation/scrolling UX requirements and may be considered section content changes beyond anchors/nav affordances.

hallucinated_features.description: LegalSections redesigned with professional card layouts and refined typography hierarchy.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and appears to be a section redesign beyond adding anchor IDs/navigation affordances.
